title: Fully furnished 2 bedroom apartment 62m2
body:
QR Code Link to This Post


Fully furnished 2 bedroom apartment for rent in the 1st arrondissement near place Vendôme and Pyramides metro station.
Total space 62m2.
Fully equipped kitchen, shower and separate WC.
Washing machine.
19th century building, well maintained. 
3rd floor (European).
Safe and quiet. 
1900 euros per month including building charges and water.
Real estate agency fee to be paid on top of the rent (one time fee).
To schedule a visit, please send us an email or contact us on WhatsApp +33663087837
